title: Grateful Dead Live at Nassau Veterans Memorial Coliseum on 1981-05-08
lineage: Master Cassettes (Nakamichi DR-1)> Tascam DA-3000 (DSF 1-bit/5.6 MHz) > dBpoweramp 24/96 > Adobe Audition CC 2019 > TLH flac2496
source: Mark Severson's Master (FOB) Audience Cassettes; (3) x Nakamichi 700 mics (left/right cardioids, omni center - standing on a chair 35' from stage)> custom mixer by Jamie Poris > Sony TC-D5M (TDK MA-C90)
